title: Study of the response behavior of a CdS–SnO2 thick film for high selectivity towards propanol gas
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16459-16465
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01888E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ankit Kumar Vishwakarma, Ajaya Kumar Sharma, Lallan Yadava
In the present paper we report structural and sensing properties of undoped and CdS-doped SnO2 thick film sensor for detection of propanol gas at operating temperature 200 °C.
